short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance language learning: Translate text, listen to selected words, and access YouGlish instantly. Maximize your language skills!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock your language learning potential with our feature-packed Chrome extension! Instantly access YouGlish, a powerful language learning resource, to enhance your skills. Translate selected text to various languages, listen to words being read aloud, and enjoy a seamless experience. Please note that some features are currently available for English language support in this version.
